item.title: Creative Commons is simple
item.description: We all shy away from licensing. You have read some license. They are usually terse and hard to read. I guess they can only be read by lawyers. Licensing is something that I find hard to . A few days back, I understood about CC license and so I thought I’ll share it here in this blog. Without going deep into copyrights and intellectual property rights, If I create something, be it a photo, a video, or a book, I have a copyright on it and anyone who wants to use, modify or sell it needs my permission.
